species.name: shuckle
descriptions: A SHUCKLE hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.
It stores berries in its shell. The berries eventually ferment to become delicious juices.
The berries it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.
The berries stored in its jar-like shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.
The fluid secreted by its toes carves holes in rocks for nesting and can be mixed with BERRIES to make a drink.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pok√©mon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.
